views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 9 and 10

Display a view behind the swiped application in the application switcher. The view displays various option to launch application, close application, relaunch application, dismiss switcher, respring, kill-all applications, relaunch-all applications and Quick Launch set of applications at different vertical offset.

Configure options from Settings.

- Made UI display and interact with multiple cards if multiple application cards are being swiped up/down - Fixed potential memory leak
- Updated donate link
- Fixed potential conflict with other app switcher tweaks
- Fixed color values resetting when changing other preferences.
- Added safemode as an action
- Changed donate link to paypal.me link in settings
- Added Personalize settings
- Added option to select label position (left, center, right).
- Added option to color various labels and background of the tweak view
- Added option to enable/disable swipe up/down actions


- Added option to set default applications settings instead of having to go through every single application.
